data.text: Mochona hemwe wanhu wa Yelusalemu,
Hamlinguhulichiza makanyo
Vilongozi wake ndo misimba jilingubuma,
Waloli wake hawalingudita chinhu kwa kulolela goya na walingubelenhuka.
Ila Mkulu Nguluwi yawele Yelusalemu ndo yatanganiche,
Mkulu Nguluwi kangulonga,
Nandijesa, ‘Ndikomya Yelusalemu wondumba na kugakunda makanyo,
Lelo, mmbeteze,
Mhela awo ndojeliza milomo ja wanhu wa isi zeng'ha,
Kulawa kumwambu mwa nzanda za Kushi
“Zuwa alyo, hambasigwa soni,
Ndowalechela wanhu wawele liholile na walingunyenyetela,
Waisilaeli wasigale,
Wimbe kwa lizi likulu, gwa Siyoni,
Mkulu Nguluwi nakawosela utaguso uwele wahawafichile,
Zuwa alyo, muji wa Yelusalemu wolonjelwa,
Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa hemwe, ka hamwe na hemwe
Mkulu Nguluwi kangulonga,
Mhela awo ndowagaza weng'ha walinguwabunza hemwe.
Mhela awo ndowakungajiza hemwe,
